subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Murders and Attempted Murders
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Chiefs somberly moved on, even managing to win a game, after linebacker Jovan Belcher fatally shot his girlfriend and then himself.
snippet: The Kansas City Chiefs somberly moved on, even managing to win a game, after linebacker Jovan Belcher fatally shot his girlfriend and then himself.
